articles.title: 유용한 HTML 도구를 만들기 위한 패턴들
articles.summary:

articles.title: 바이브 코딩 하실 분들을 위한 작은 조언 chatGPT5.2 / 클로드 / 제미나이3
articles.summary:
• 코딩 관련 완성도 : GPT5.2 > GPT5.1 >>> Sonnet4.5 >> GEMINI 3 pro
  • ChatGPT5 계열은 코딩시 환각 및 망각이 타사 대비 압도적으로 적음. 5.2는 5.1대비 가격이 40% 인상
  • CLAUDE Sonnet 4.5은 자동 캐싱이 안 되서 요금제 전반에 큰 함정

articles.title: Hashcards: 일반 텍스트 기반의 간격 반복 시스템

articles.title: 유럽인의 건강 데이터, 전 이스라엘 정보요원들이 운영하는 미국 기업에 매각

articles.title: WhatsApp’s biggest market is becoming its toughest test
articles.summary: Meta has three months to comply with Indian government directions that could affect how WhatsApp operates in the country.

articles.title: Grok got crucial facts wrong about Bondi Beach shooting
articles.summary: Grok, the chatbot built by Elon Musk’s xAI and popularized on his social media platform X, appears to have repeatedly spread misinformation about today’s mass shooting at Bondi Beach in Australia.

articles.title: Mesa shuts down credit card that rewarded cardholders for paying their mortgages
articles.summary: Fintech startup Mesa has shut down its Homeowners Card, which awarded points to cardholders for paying their mortgages.

articles.title: Making sense of the risky Netflix-Warner Bros. deal
articles.summary: Netflix's $82.6 billion acquisition of Warner Bros. encapsulates a fraught moment for Hollywood, as the entertainment business is increasingly overshadowed by tech giants.
